info.name: Nexon Forums - War Rock Scheme
info.description: A theme for the new War Rock forums that impersonates the Gamers First forums. Removal of Blue Navigation Bar and Nexon Forum Logo.
info.additionalInfo:
Created by linkinxero.

(Updated 6/9/2012 9:27 AM EST / 9/6/2012 13:27 GMT)

The latest update is not displayed in the screenshots. I have changed the latest/newest reply images (the arrows next to names on the far right) so that they don't have the white background behind the arrow and are now transparent.
